unnormalised: My neighbour's daughter, Km. Radhika, is getting married next month; her parents are so excited! Even though she prefers to be addressed as Ms. Radhika now, everyone still calls her "Kumari" out of habit.
normalised: My neighbor's daughter, Kumari Radhika, is getting married next month; her parents are so excited! Even though she prefers to be addressed as Miss Radhika now, everyone still calls her "Kumari" out of habit.
